Points to a hosted css file: Points to a hosted css file
Title: Title
If a personalized text value isn\\\"t av: If a personalized text value isn\"t available, then a default value is shown.
This block allows you to display text in: This block allows you to display text in your email
Displays a responsive image in your emai: Displays a responsive image in your email. It is similar to the HTML \'<img/>\' tag. Note that if no width is provided, the image will use the parent column width.
This block displays a hero image. It beh: This block displays a hero image. It behaves like an \'section\' with a single \'column\'.
Displays a menu for navigation with an o: Displays a menu for navigation with an optional hamburger mode for mobile devices.
Displays a horizontal divider that can b: Displays a horizontal divider that can be customized like a HTML border.
Accordion is an interactive component to: Accordion is an interactive component to stack content in tabs, so the information is collapsed and only the titles are visible. Readers can interact by clicking on the tabs to reveal the content, providing a great experience on mobile devices where space is scarce.
This block displays a gallery of images: This block displays a gallery of images or \'carousel\'. Readers can interact by hovering and clicking on thumbnails depending on the email client they use.
Displays calls-to-action for various soc: Displays calls-to-action for various social networks with their associated logo.
Wrapper enables to wrap multiple section: Wrapper enables to wrap multiple sections together. It"s especially useful to achieve nested layouts with shared border or background images across sections.
Sections are intended to be used as rows: Sections are intended to be used as rows within your email. They will be used to structure the layout.
Sections cannot nest in sections. Column: Sections cannot nest in sections. Columns can nest in sections; all content must be in a column.
Group allows you to prevent columns from: Group allows you to prevent columns from stacking on mobile. To do so, wrap the columns inside a group block, so they"ll stay side by side on mobile.
Columns enable you to horizontally organ:
Columns enable you to horizontally organize the content within
                your sections. They must be located under "Section" block in order
                to be considered by the engine. To be responsive, columns are
                expressed in terms of percentage.
Every single column has to contain somet:
Every single column has to contain something because they are
                responsive containers, and will be vertically stacked on a mobile
                view.
Subject: Subject
SubTitle: SubTitle
Allows you to control on which breakpoin: Allows you to control on which breakpoint the layout should go desktop/mobile.
The image suffix should be .jpg, jpeg, p: The image suffix should be .jpg, jpeg, png, gif, etc. Otherwise, the picture may not be displayed normally.
title: title
Column inside a group must have a width: Column inside a group must have a width in percentage, not in pixel
Make it easy for everyone to compose ema: Make it easy for everyone to compose emails!
You must edit the image in order to resi: You must edit the image in order to resize it
Duplicate Properties, the property alrea: Duplicate Properties, the property already exists
Must be a valid regular expression: Must be a valid regular expression
Enum must not have duplicate values: Enum must not have duplicate values
ENUM Values - One Entry Per Line: ENUM Values - One Entry Per Line

A nova senha e a confirmação devem ser i: The new password and confirmation must be the same.
